attributes.action: not put Charie Blair forward for any Honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cherie Blair has not been involved more than any other citizen in activities which would warrant an Honour. Secondly as she is a professed Republican we as a nation should not put her in the position of being a hypocrite in having to accept an honour from the Queen.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
